title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.1 - Limitation on partnership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4220.1 - Limitation on partnership

State Regulations
A horse may be owned by an individual or by a
partnership, provided such partnership complies with this Subchapter, but no
horse shall be entered and run by an owning partnership if it contains more
than four members or if the proportionate interest of any member is less than
25 percent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4220.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
